text: Have you tried using the new proxy URL mapping type for this?
It doesn't solve the underlying problem, but should at least allow you to host the page at the URL you're interested in.

I have - sorry didn’t update the thread based on a thread that was in a dif channel.

Proxy solves part of the problem but then creates a new problem unfortunately
so proxy is a great solution to this, unfortunately the page that is being proxied is still accessible, and still going to show in the sitemap, which will mean SEO would be bad
not sure I have a good solution to that off the top of my head
yea. For the mean time i’ve resorted to doing the proxy and when we launch I’ll use robots.txt to block the proxied page
